name: Orange Afghani
description: Orange Afghani by Bedford Grow is a heavy indica with bright terpenes. Crossing an Orange Ghost mother and a Lashkar Gah/White ‘91 father, Orange Afghani inherits tart citrus terpenes overlain by a sweet, floral undertone native to many traditional Kush cuts. This strain has a happy, euphoric buzz that couples well with its functional relaxation. Orange Afghani is also known to produce high levels of the terpene terpinolene.
descriptionPlain: Orange Afghani by Bedford Grow is a heavy indica with bright terpenes. Crossing an Orange Ghost mother and a Lashkar Gah/White ‘91 father, Orange Afghani inherits tart citrus terpenes overlain by a sweet, floral undertone native to many traditional Kush cuts. This strain has a happy, euphoric buzz that couples well with its functional relaxation. Orange Afghani is also known to produce high levels of the terpene terpinolene.

highlightedReviews.text: First impressions -- love the smell, almost like skittles or some other sour candy ðŸ’œ This pretty little indica hit me with some surprisingly cerebral effects, perfect for disappearing into a video game or a good movie at the end of a stressful day. Really helps with daytime pain without putting me right to sleep, but I might skip this one when I need to focus on creative projects or socializing, if only because my attention span was tough to pin down. Thanks for the sweet stuff, AZ Organix! Hope to see this one around town more often. :)
Nice and fluffy. Smooth to smoke, very very relaxing.
